text: Euphorbia boivinii is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to Madagascar. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Madagascar boivinii Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Pierre Edmond Boissier
title: Euphorbia boivinii
